Sentece: PLA microsphere formulations revealed lack of cytotoxicity and a mass median aerodynamic diameter (MMDA) of 2.22-2.86 mum, while PLGA particles were larger (MMDA of 4.67-5.11 mum).
Title: Slow release formulations of inhaled rifampin.
Name: MMDA

Sentece: PLA microsphere formulations revealed lack of cytotoxicity and a mass median aerodynamic diameter (MMDA) of 2.22-2.86 mum, while PLGA particles were larger (MMDA of 4.67-5.11 mum).
Title: Slow release formulations of inhaled rifampin.
Name: MMDA

Sentece: Pharmacokinetics differed among the formulations with the 10% PLA formulation showing a distinct sustained release (t (max) of 2 h vs 0.5 h of free drug) and a systemic bioavailability similar to that of free drug.
Title: Slow release formulations of inhaled rifampin.
Name: MMDA

Name: MMDA

Sentece: Formulations with high polymer content showed a lower relative bioavailability (30%).
Title: Slow release formulations of inhaled rifampin.
